entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
